channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped trees/ bushes/garden waste, 15th July
item.description:
Approximately 3/4 weeks ago, overnight some one has dumped a large load of trees/bushes/garden waste in the stream and grass area, at the very end of Sparrow Drive, it is partly blocking the stream, its now more obvious as the cut tree/bushes have turned brown/dead, i have only seen this from the footpath side, it will flood the path when there is the next big heavy rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sparrow Drive, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing pavement slaps trip hazard, 15th July
item.description:
This is the bike lane between Lowndes Square and Knightsbridge which recently underwent public realm works to create 2 way lane for bikes and one way for cars. This area also holds a meter of some sort, but it is completely exposed now and is a hazard for cyclists and trip hazard for people walking across the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lowndes Square, Chelsea, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping again, 15th July

item.title: Junction of St Panras Way & Barker Drive, 15th July
item.description:
The old bollard was being removed by drivers wanting to gain access to Barker Drive. It was replaced after the issue was reported, approx 2 weeks ago. The new, larger bollard has the same issue. It is being removed, and left propped up on the pavement where it can be a hazard to children/elderly, or by being left on the the road by someone wishing to cause damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barker Drive, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near 43 Falkland Rd, new electric vehicle recharging point opposite church, 15th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Falkland Road, Tufnell Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All the trees and bushes are not being cut back., 15th July
item.description:
All the trees and bushes are NOT being cut back, and they are overhanging into our property, i have tried to contact the secretary of the allotments, however, they do not seem to do anything about these issues. This has been going one now for well over a year, and it is now affecting our walls and fences.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warwick Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
